title: [feature request] Official CUDA support for macOS through eGPU
body_html:
Issue description

The macOS distribution of pytorch lacks CUDA support while eGPU for macOS is ready on the market.
Some people managed to use eGPU with Tensorflow/Keras successfully on macOS (https://gist.github.com/richardxiong/4d5ca09e5bb3ece846c03416624a36f5).

Any plans?
